summary: Let’s meets the characters of So Into You, shall we? There’s one who looks familiar🤔if you have read my other stuff, you’ll spot...
body:
So Into You: Characters

Let’s meets the characters of So Into You, shall we? There’s one who looks familiar🤔if you have read my other stuff, you’ll spot her easily!

L to R: Jackson-Alexander Family

Monica Elaine Jackson-Alexander: Business lawyer, Harvard grad. Delta Sigma Theta alumni. [Sheryl Lee Ralph]

Andre David Alexander: Harvard medical grad. Surgeon. Alpha Phi Alpha alumni. [Brian Stokes Mitchell]

Xavier Seth Alexander: Howard grad, sports medicine. Alpha Phi Alpha alumni. [Tone Bell]

Roxanne Danielle Alexander: Howard grad, BA in theatre arts with a minor in business. Dallas business school, masters in business administration and business owner. Former cheerleader. Alpha Kappa Alpha alumni. Chris Evans’ best friend. [Ashley Blaine Featherson]

Jeremiah Dallas Alexander: Howard university student. Journalism major. Pledging Kappa Alpha Psi. [John Boyega]

Jennifer Imani Alexander: Lincoln Sudbury Regional High School. Wants to be an actress. [Skai Jackson]

L to R: Best Friend Squad

Genevieve Leona Shaw: Howard University grad in nursing. Was on the cheer team with Roxie. Delta Sigma Theta alumni. [Sevyn Streeter]

Isaiah Malachi Matthews: Howard university grad in music theory, minor in business. Building up his career from the ground up. Kappa Alpha Psi alumni. Married to Aaliyah Santana-Matthews. [Rotimi]

Melinda Jasmine Johnson: Howard university grad in fashion merchandising. Roxie’s college roommate. Alpha Kappa Alpha alumni. Business owner with her fiancé, Zack Dillard. [Elle Varner]

Zack Lee Dillard: Howard university medical grad, surgeon. Kappa Alpha Psi alumni. Business owner with his fiancé, Melinda Johnson. [Ludi Lin]

Aaliyah Jade Santana-Matthews: Howard university grad in theatre arts. Aspiring actress. Alpha Kappa Alpha alumni. Married to Isaiah Matthews. [Naya Rivera]

summary: I read in your tags Chris Evans is the only one in your top 3 you haven't hugged yet? Nr 1 is -obviously- Seb but who is the...
question: I read in your tags Chris Evans is the only one in your top 3 you haven't hugged yet? Nr 1 is -obviously- Seb but who is the other one? And who's the best hugger? Love your blog btw💜💜💜
answer:
Ohhh I love this ask! lol Thank you, nonny ;)

Well, my top 3 is Sebastian Stan, Chris Evans and Jason Momoa. Chris and Seb are my main guys and Jason has been a longtime crush of mine, ever since Stargate. 

Chris is indeed the only one of these 3 I haven’t hugged yet, and I’m a realist I don’t think that will ever happen either (and it’s okay tbh)
I mean 2 out of 3 ain’t bad, right? I’m extremely lucky as it is.

Who’s the best hugger? Oh god…I wanna say Seb because it meant so much to me to finally hug him but I’d be lying if I said he was the best hugger. It’s definitely Jason Momoa for me. 

Just imagine the scene, okay: it’s the middle of a very hot summer in the UK, he has this huge fan in his photo booth with him that makes his hair blow perfectly into the wind, there’s rock music playing in the background (his choice of music I presume) and he’s wearing a very tiny bright red top showing off all his muscle. 

And he is bigger than I imagined, I mean, not even joking the man looks like an actual god among mortal men, he just takes your breath away.

What caught me off guard with Jason is that he comes across as this very loud and kinda aggressive guy sometimes but he was so gentle with me, his hug was so soft and so warm and I could still feel his hands on my arms for a while afterwards. I also felt his rock hard fucking abs under my hand as I had it on his stomach. 

I was physically shaking as I left the photo booth too.

And I mean, this is just the hugging part, Jason was also warmer in greeting me than Seb was, he actually looked into my eyes twice.
And I know this is nothing personal and probably also very random, I’m sure I could meet both men again and have a totally different experience with both of them. 

(I’m actually seeing Jason again later this summer and I’m curious to see if that meeting will hold up against the first one.)

Anyway, I’m rambling, sorry, should the opportunity ever arise that I could hug Chris I would absolutely go for it of course! ;)

summary: I’m Here to Stay
title: I’m Here to Stay
body:
Summary:It’ll break your heart but no worries, I’m a peach and I’ll fix it (summary curtesy of @coffeebooksandfandom)
Warnings: Angst,
Pairings: Chris Evans x Reader
Word Count: 992
Prompt: “I’m not going anywhere. I won’t leave. I won’t give up. And I will be here every single time you need me. You can doubt it. You can try to push me away because you think I’ll just leave anyway but that will never be true. I don’t care if there are a hundred million reasons to leave.. you’re the only reason I’ll ever need to stay.” ❤ Can’t wait to see what this turns into
AN: Requested by @sfreeborn Thank you for requesting! 💜💜
Italics are messages!
⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟

“Chris? Chris are you here?”

Kicking my shoes off, I placed my keys in the bowl by the door. Dodger came bounding up to me, his tongue to the side as he wagged his tail. I knelt down, laughing as he licked my face.

“Hey boy, where’s you dad huh? Is he home?”

Dodger just barked, continuing to lick my face as I laughed.

“Alright boy let me up.”

Dodger wagged his tail I got up, following beside me as I walked through the house.

“Chris? Chris are you home?”

There was no reply, the master and the guest bedrooms were empty, and I sighed, sitting on the edge of our bed, pulling my phone out.

Sorry I’m not home. Filming went longer than we expected it to and I’m not sure when I’ll be home so don’t stay up. Love you ❤️

I sighed, laying back on the bed, Dodger jumping up and sitting beside me.

“Well, guess it’s just you and me tonight. What do you want to do? Do you want to go for a walk?”

He wagged his tail faster causing me to laugh as I got up.

“Well, come on. Let’s go out.”

⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟

“Hey, where’s Y/N?”

Chris sighed, picking at the label on the beer bottle.
“Home.”

“Why?”

Chris shrugged, picking up the bottle.

“Told her I was just going to stay on set tonight.”

“Okay… Why?”

Chris sighed, looking over at Seb.

“Just-I didn’t want to go home tonight. It’s been a long day, that’s all.”
“Is everything okay with you both?”

“Yeah, yeah I’m just exhausted. It’s been a really, really long day.”

Seb nodded, pushing the tray of fries towards Chris.

“Well, let’s blow some steam, yeah?”

“Okay.”
⍟⍟⍟⍟Week Later⍟⍟⍟⍟

Whenever Chris is home, it’s like all we do is fight. He no longer stays over, instead choosing to either stay on set or crashing on Sebs couch.

“I just don’t understand! What did I do? We were fine and then-”
“And then shit happens!”
I sighed, letting my shoulders drop.

“Chris I just- what happened? What changed?”

Chris shrugged, moving to sit on the edge of the bed.

“I don’t know. Honestly, I don’t.”

“Do you still love me?”
He looked up, tears in his eyes.

“Of course I do.”
“Then talk to me. Just, just talk to me. We promised each other we’d always be open with each other and that we’d never go to bed angry. You haven’t even been home for me to know if you’re mad! So please, just talk to me.”
“I don’t know what to say.”
“You do, it’s just hard to say it.”
Chris sighed, running a hand down his face.

“We just-we’re not working, not anymore. We’re two completely different people. It’s just- it’s time to call it quits.”
I shook my head, pushing off the wall.

“Chris, you don’t mean that. Where’s this coming from?”

“I’m holding you back. We’re two different people. We both want different things in life.”

I moved to kneel in front of him, resting my hand on top of his thighs.

“Chris, Chris look at me.”
He looked down at me, tears falling down his cheeks.

“I love you okay. I only ever love you, well I love Dodger too but you know.”
I shrugged, causing a small smile to form on Chris’s face.

“I want you in my life, I want to marry you, I want to have a family with you. Everytime I think of my future, you’re in it.”

“You promise?”
I nodded, wiping his tears.

“I promise.”

“You’ll stay?”
I nodded, smiling up at him.

“I’m not going anywhere. I won’t leave. I won’t give up. And I will be here every single time you need me. You can doubt it. You can try to push me away because you think I’ll just leave anyway but that will never be true. I don’t care if there are a hundred million reasons to leave.. You’re the only reason I’ll ever need to stay.”

Chris smiled, pulling me up into his lap, kissing me. I ran my fingers through his hair, his hands coming to rest on my hips.

“I love you.”
I smiled, resting my forehead on his.”
“I love you too.”
⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟

“So, were you serious about what you said earlier?”
Running my hand over his chest, I looked up at him, seeing the twinkle in his eyes.

“Which part? The part that I love you?”
He grinned, shaking his head.

“No, not that part. The part about our future. The one where we’re married.”
I nodded, smiling up at him.

“I did.”

He smiled, leaning up.

“Hey!”
He laughed, reaching over for the nightstand and opening the drawer before he turned back towards me.

“I love you.”

“I love you too.”
He smiled, shaking his head.
“You’re the best thing to ever happen to me. I’ve always imagined our life together, the two of us growing old with our grankids running around.”
“Grankids? Dam, moving right to it aren’t you?”

“Shut up would ya?”
I laughed, resting my head on my arm.

“Alright, alright.”

“I want to spend every moment with you, ever happy and sad moment. I know this isn’t as romantic or whatever but Y/N, will you marry me?”

I gasped, sitting up, the sheet falling to my waist.

“What?”
He grinned, opening the box.

“Marry me.”

“Seriously?”
“Yes.”

I grinned, moving so I was sitting on his lap, kissing him.

“Is that a yes?”
I laughed, grabbing his face and kissing him again.

“It’s a hell yes.”

Chris smiled, grabbing my hand and sliding the ring on.
“I love you.”

⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟

I started to laugh, the light from the lamp catching on my ring as I ran my hand across Chris’s chest, his arm moving along my spine.

“What’s so funny?”
“You.”
“Me?”
I nodded, looking up at him.

“Yeah, cause you proposed when we were both naked.”

“I’m not going anywhere. I won’t leave. I won’t give up. And I will be here every single time you need me. You can doubt it. You can try to push me away because you think I’ll just leave anyway but that will never be true. I don’t care if there are a hundred million reasons to leave.. You’re the only reason I’ll ever need to stay.”

Chris smiled, pulling me up into his lap, kissing me. I ran my fingers through his hair, his hands coming to rest on my hips.

“I love you.”
I smiled, resting my forehead on his.”
“I love you too.”

“So, were you serious about what you said earlier?”
Running my hand over his chest, I looked up at him, seeing the twinkle in his eyes.

“Which part? The part that I love you?”
He grinned, shaking his head.

“No, not that part. The part about our future. The one where we’re married.”
I nodded, smiling up at him.

“I did.”

He smiled, leaning up.

“Hey!”
He laughed, reaching over for the nightstand and opening the drawer before he turned back towards me.

“I love you.”

“I love you too.”
He smiled, shaking his head.
“You’re the best thing to ever happen to me. I’ve always imagined our life together, the two of us growing old with our grankids running around.”
“Grankids? Dam, moving right to it aren’t you?”

“Shut up would ya?”
I laughed, resting my head on my arm.

“Alright, alright.”

“I want to spend every moment with you, ever happy and sad moment. I know this isn’t as romantic or whatever but Y/N, will you marry me?”

I gasped, sitting up, the sheet falling to my waist.

“What?”
He grinned, opening the box.

“Marry me.”

“Seriously?”
“Yes.”

I grinned, moving so I was sitting on his lap, kissing him.

“Is that a yes?”
I laughed, grabbing his face and kissing him again.

“It’s a hell yes.”

Chris smiled, grabbing my hand and sliding the ring on.
“I love you.”

⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟⍟

I started to laugh, the light from the lamp catching on my ring as I ran my hand across Chris’s chest, his arm moving along my spine.

“What’s so funny?”
“You.”
“Me?”
I nodded, looking up at him.

“Yeah, cause you proposed when we were both naked.”
